about_the_game:
The 2D Fighting Game With a Twist: It's Turn-Based!



Mega Knockdown is a fast-paced combo of turn-based strategy and classic 2D fighters. Get ready to jump right into the real challenge at the heart of fighting games: outsmarting your friends and predicting their next move!

Gameplay Highlights
  • Simple controls with no timing requirement
  • Deep strategy and challenging single player CPU opponents
  • Smooth online play, anywhere across the globe!
  • Play a fighting game at your own pace: take your turns slowly and strategically, or raise your heartbeat with BLITZ time settings!
  • Meet colorful hand-drawn characters: the fireball-throwing slacker, the grappler with a heart of gold, the burnout haunted by a long-limbed spirit, and more!
  • Jockey for position and weave in and out of range of attacks. Are you a true master of fighting game footsies? Prove it!
  • Get the upper hand on your opponents with a knockdown, and press the advantage with a 'meaty attack' on their wakeup!
  • Express yourself! Do you carefully block and punish your way to victory, or do you assert dominance with a wild and aggressive gameplan?

Modes and Features:

  • Arcade Mode (with story scenes)
  • Online Multiplayer Lobbies
  • Local Versus
  • Interactive Tutorial
  • Survival Mode
  • Blitz speed variants
  • Training Mode with frame data display
  • Replays Viewer
  • Controller Support
  • Accessible difficulty settings
  • 6 Playable Characters
  • 3 Selectable Art Styles
  • Swappable, moddable character color palettes
